allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial implementation of ShopKeepers-NexoAddon

Bridge plugin that synchronizes Nexo custom items with Shopkeepers offers.
Listens to NexoItemsLoadedEvent to update all shopkeeper offers with current
Nexo item definitions, and monitors trades as a safety net for outdated items.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix workflow to trigger on release creation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
